Uses of Interface
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing
    Provides the API for tracing of flow execution.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.execution
    Classes providing flow execution strategies.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows
    Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.history
    Classes relating to the capture, storage and retrieval of Flow execution trace histories.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.tracing
    Provides a tracing FlowVisitor implementation which constructs a TracedAction.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors
    Provides the basic FlowVisitor implementation needed to execute a Flow, together with the Visitors public entry point for obtaining and composing Visitors.

    • Uses of Action in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing

      Subinterfaces of Action in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TracedAction
      An Action which notifies a TraceEventListener of trace events correlated with a TraceMap.
